title: The Inheritance
description: Eighteen-year-old Iliani's wedding day is interrupted by Alaex the Destroyer, who claims Iliani was already wed to him. Against her wishes, Alaex takes Iliani back home with him--leaving Iliani to sort her suspicion about her new husband from the voice in her heart which whispers the promise of everlasting love.
author: Antoinette Wrighton
